parks.name: Zion National Park
parks.description: A red rock wonderland known for its steep canyons, hikes, and the Virgin River.

parks.name: Grand Canyon National Park
parks.description: World-famous for its immense canyon carved by the Colorado River.

parks.name: Rocky Mountain National Park
parks.description: Snow-capped peaks, alpine lakes, and wildlife in the heart of the Rockies.

parks.name: Acadia National Park
parks.description: Coastal mountains, rocky shorelines, and scenic hiking on the Atlantic coast.

parks.name: Glacier National Park
parks.description: Known for glacier-carved peaks, alpine meadows, and Going-to-the-Sun Road.

parks.name: Arches National Park
parks.description: Features over 2,000 natural stone arch formations in a stunning desert setting.

parks.name: Olympic National Park
parks.description: A diverse park with mountains, rainforests, and Pacific coastline in one place.

parks.name: Joshua Tree National Park
parks.description: Desert park where the Mojave and Colorado ecosystems meet among surreal rock formations.

parks.name: Everglades National Park
parks.description: Subtropical wetlands home to alligators, mangroves, and rare wildlife.

parks.name: Mount Rainier National Park
parks.description: Dominated by the glacier-capped Mount Rainier, with wildflower meadows and vast trails.
